General.Name: Tembo Global Industries Limited
General.Description: Tembo Global Industries Limited manufactures and fabricates various engineering and steel products in India and internationally. It offers various products, such as sprinkler and pipe hangers; slotted channels, saddle hose, strut, and beam clamps; dielectric unions, cantilever arms, and rubber support insulations; two/four bolt pipe clamps, metallic & flexible expansion joints, and pipe roller chairs; inertia base, open/close spring mount and anti-vibration pads; threaded rods, hex bolt & nuts, and washers; stud anchors, rawl bolts, and drop-in anchors; forged fittings; and flanges, as well as various types of bathroom pipes, fittings, bathroom accessories, and sanitary wares. The company also manufactures and exports textile products, such as fibre & yarns; suitings; bedsheets & handkerchiefs; and shirting, uniform, and knitted fabrics. In addition, it manufactures pharmaceuticals and medicinal chemical products, and trades in fabricated metal products. The company's products have applications in pipe support systems, fasteners, anchors, HVAC, anti-vibration systems and equipment for industrial, commercial, utility and OEM installations. The company was formerly known as Saketh Exim Limited. Tembo Global Industries Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Navi Mumbai, India.
General.Address: TTC Industrial Estate, Navi Mumbai, India, 400705
